subject: Blair's epitaph
body:
BBC EMAIL NEWS - HTML














 BBC
								Daily E-mail
 Other
								e-mail newsletters



















						WEDNESDAY 27 JUNE 22:30 BST - BBC TWO



					Blair's Epitaph



						Oops, of course we meant 'epitaph' not 'epigraph' (which is slightly different).


On this, Tony Blair's last day as prime minister, we'd like to invite you to write his political epitaph in 15 words. We'll publish the winner on our website.


Or send us your thoughts on his ten year premiership, and what policy changes you would like Zombie Brown to introduce.


Send your epitaphs by  clicking here

















 


  
SEARCH BBC NEWS
